mapper.insert: insert into account (account_no, account_name, account_type, status, balance, create_time, currency, balance_direction, last_trans_time) values (#{accountNo}, #{accountName}, #{accountType}, #{status}, #{balance}, now(), #{currency}, #{direction}, now())
mapper.select: select * from account where account_no = #{accountNo} for update;
mapper.update: update account set status=#{status}, update_time=NOW() where account_no = #{accountNo};
